tasks.build: mkdir -p build && deno compile --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --output build/clipo clipo.ts
tasks.build-all: deno task build && deno task build-macos && deno task build-linux && deno task build-windows
tasks.build-macos: mkdir -p build && deno compile --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output build/clipo-macos-x64 clipo.ts && deno compile --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --target aarch64-apple-darwin --output build/clipo-macos-arm64 clipo.ts
tasks.build-linux: mkdir -p build && deno compile --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output build/clipo-linux-x64 clipo.ts
tasks.build-windows: mkdir -p build && deno compile --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output build/clipo-windows-x64.exe clipo.ts
